title: Tab grid layout in chrome via Pixel/Android is undesirable. Please bring back old tab layouts!!
content:
The new google chrome grid layout is horrible! So many unnecessary steps just to close tabs, and I dont even know how my tabs are combined and uncombined. It makes no sense. 

I cannot change it back to the previous vertical layout.

Yes i tried change the settings via :flags, but that only changes it until i close/open chrome the next time.
